mapper.sql: store_id, store_name, province, city, region, longitude, latitude, hs_code, addr_detail, supportDeliver
mapper.select: select a.* from web_napa_stores as a left join web_napa_store_user_link d on a.store_id=d.store_id left join web_user_profiles as b on d.user_id=b.user_id left join web_user_role_link as c on b.user_id=c.user_id where b.phone=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.role_id=3
select A.* from web_napa_stores as A left join web_specification_value_store_link As B on a.store_id=b.store_id where B.value_id = #{valueId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select A.*,b.全称 as hs_name from web_napa_stores as A left join department as B on A.hs_code=B.编号 where A.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select A.*,b.全称 as hs_name from web_napa_stores as A left join department as B on A.hs_code=B.编号
mapper.insert: insert into web_napa_stores (store_id, store_name, province, city, region, longitude, latitude, hs_code, supportDeliver, addr_detail) values (#{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supportDeliver,jdbcType=VARCHAR} #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into web_napa_stores
store_id,
store_name,
province,

longitude,
latitude,
hs_code,
supportDeliver,
addr_detail,

mapper.update:
update web_napa_stores
store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
hs_code = #{hsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supportDeliver = #{supportDeliver,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr_detail = #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update web_napa_stores set store_name = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, province = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, region = #{region,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hs_code = #{hsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supportDeliver = #{supportDeliver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr_detail = #{addrDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where store_id = #{storeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
